msg: Fix issue where an inclusive range query would include the nearest term in the index above a non-existant specified upper term.

msg: Fix NullPointerException in clone() method when the Term is null.

msg: Removed some redundant code.  This is already in BooleanScorer.

msg: Removed broken build scripts and their libs.  Build requires separate ant installation.

author: cutting
msg: JDK 1.1 compatibility fix: disabled lock files for JDK 1.1, since they rely on a feature added in JDK 1.2.
